entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 2:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: N 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
